project.description:
This job builds Zato packages using Ansible.
It executes Ansible playbook which in turn executes 'build.sh' script. It's required to specify a path to the playbook and assign it to 'PATH_TO_ANSIBLE_PLAYBOOK' parameter.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify a Zato release version the package will be build for.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PACKAGE_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify package number within Zato release version defined as previous parameter.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Git branch to pull Zato source code from.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLIENT_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: OPTIONAL! Enter only if you want specifically to build a package for a client. Pattern: /<[0-9][a-f]>-<client_name>. Remember about opening slash. Use six characters in first part of the pattern.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: DISTRIBUTION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Choose a Linux distribution to build a package for. Alternatively, you can choose "all" to build packages for all distributions in a single operation.
